title: TheButterZone

content: If you don't want to pay with BTC, I also accept cash, but absolutely no PayPal or other non-cash scammer payment methods.Please PM, text 619-393-2253, contact me via my website, or Matrix me. Don't, if you won't prove that you have enough funds to pay immediately.Shipped to me from somewhere in Asia? May be the base version of the FAB Defense FXGLSHOCKCP before they printed text on it, in which case, this is 1/2 retail price.$68.30/ (SegWit/standard), free shipping within the U.S. (including to an international shipping forwarding service of your choice) OR$60/ options in order of preference:#1: You pick up in San Diego, CA#2: I give it to a UPS Store with your prepaid shipment code, they package & ship on your dime.#3: You provide a prepaid USPS Priority flat rate padded envelope PDF that I'll print & slap on.
